folder.name: dp-203/02-Serverless SQL/02-Demo-Query files using a serverless SQL pool

content.query:
-- Demo: Query files using a serverless SQL pool
-- Task: Use SQL to query JSON files

-- The script is designed to query comma-delimited (CSV) data rather then JSON, so you need to make a few modifications before it will work successfully.
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeweslbo.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-500/01/data/*.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]


-- Modify the query as follows so that it uses the JSON_VALUE function to extract individual field values from the JSON data.
SELECT JSON_VALUE(Doc, '$.SalesOrderNumber') AS OrderNumber,
    JSON_VALUE(Doc, '$.CustomerName') AS Customer,
    Doc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeweslbo.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-500/01/data/*.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) WITH (Doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) as rows
